dialogue.introduction: Sir, please let Maruyu keep working hard.
dialogue.library_intro: Maruyu isn’t from the Navy shipyards, so I don’t have any friends from home. I’m a little different from everyone else… I mean, the first thing Kiso-san said to me was “What are you. Can you actually go underwater?”... I'm starting to wonder if Maruyu can survive out here...
dialogue.secretary1: Sir, don’t you call me Mole-chan too!
dialogue.secretary3: I told you, It's not 'mole'! My name is Maruyu!
dialogue.secretaryidle: Siiir… I get the feeling people are just looking at me from a distance… Why is that?
dialogue.secretarymarried: Oh, are you tired? Why don't you relax with Maruyu?
dialogue.wedding: S..Sir. To care for Maruyu this much... Maruyu is touched! I'll keep on doing my best!
dialogue.show_players_score: Maruyu, delivering a communication to you sir. Otherwise known as “Mole-mail”… Huh?
dialogue.equipment1: I wonder if there’s anyway to fix my slow speed…
dialogue.equipment2: So, um… Could I.. um, get a, um… “Seiran” too… oh…. never mind…
dialogue.equipment3: Don't call me Moley. I'm Maruyu!
dialogue.expedition_selection: Don't call me Moley. I'm Maruyu!
dialogue.resource_collection: Don't call me Moley. I'm Maruyu!
dialogue.instant_repair: Don't call me Moley. I'm Maruyu!
dialogue.development: Don't call me Moley. I'm Maruyu!
dialogue.supply: Now I can go underwater again!
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: Please give me a little rest.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: U wa~a it's tattered, although it's the important swimsuit that I got from the captain...
dialogue.ship_construction: I wonder if there'll be another Army girl coming...
dialogue.battle_start: Maruyu will transport it properly to the very end!
dialogue.attack: Maruyu will transport it properly to the very end!
dialogue.night_attack: I can see you all the way round!
dialogue.artillery_spotting: I can see you all the way round!
dialogue.night_special_attack_modifier_cutin_at_n: I can see you all the way round!
dialogue.support_expedition_team_arrival: I can see you all the way round!
dialogue.mvp: Maruyu can be amazing too, you know! …Wait, did someone just call me a mole?
dialogue.minor_damaged1: I see you managed to find me...!
dialogue.sunk: No... I don’t want to go down... I don’t want to...!

hourly.0000: 0000 hours. Sir, it’s now time to rest.
hourly.0100: 0100 hours. If you’re staying up sir, so will I.
hourly.0200: 0200 hours. Sir, I'll make sure I'll dive better tomorrow!
hourly.0300: 0300 hours. How am I doing with everyone else? I… It's fine! Of course it's fine!
hourly.0400: 0400 hours. You worry too much, sir.
hourly.0500: 0500 hours. It’s almost morning. I’ll go wake everyone up.
hourly.0600: 0600 hours. All the ships were already awake… Ha ha ha…
hourly.0700: 0700 hours. Okay, Maruyu will off to the cafeteria.
hourly.0800: 0800 hours. *Sigh* My eyes are red? That’s… that's just because I didn’t sleep properly last night... I think?
hourly.0900: 0900 hours. Okay, sir! Let’s switch the mood, and march on forward!
hourly.1000: 1000 hours. I told you, I’m not sad!
hourly.1100: 1100 hours. It’s almost time for a fun lunch!
hourly.1200: 1200 hours. Maruyu’s going to go underwater for a bit. I’ll see you after lunch!
hourly.1300: 1300 hours. Hmm, today’s swim went pretty well!
hourly.1400: 1400 hours. Having a late lunch. Oh these? These are combat rations!
hourly.1500: 1500 hours. Huh. I guess you have a lot of friends, sir.
hourly.1600: 1600 hours. But Maruyu has you, so that’s okay.
hourly.1700: 1700. It’s sunset. And Maruyu’s all alone…
hourly.1800: 1800. Huh!? You’d like me to cook, sir!? B-but, I'm not sure if I can do curry...
hourly.1900: 1900. Oh, I don’t know how to make curry… What I am going to do…
hourly.2000: 2000. Oh… I-it’s you! You’re going to teach me? Oh, thank you so much!
hourly.2100: 2100. Here is your curry, sir! Kiso-san taught me how!
hourly.2200: 2200. That was good, wasn’t it sir!
hourly.2300: 2300. Sir, friends are nice, aren’t they!
